TextBlock.Text: AZOLLA: Okalis, Sennetti, meet Nesia and I at <color=orange>Graviton's Folly</color> as soon as you can.
SENNETTI: Can I ask why our presence is required? I am still working on further studying Dree culture.
AZOLLA: We have news, but it is news best delivered in person. I'm sorry, but that is all I can say.
OKALIS: Understood, I only need to finish a few things before I make my way over.
